amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, for the Air Force for boron energy cell technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 810 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6896; text: CR S6896) To provide, with an offset, an additional $5,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, for the Air Force for boron energy cell technology.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 810 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
